excerpt.rendered:
The Watertaxi FL is an aluminum taxi boat of 12.17 m long and 3.15 m wide. The draft is 0.66m and the vertical clearance 2.74m. The hull weight is 4,000kg. What distinguishes the Watertaxi FL from the XL is that this aluminium boat can not only transport passengers, but also their bicycles or other goods. This water taxi model can transport a total of 12 people.

Just like the Watertaxi 30 XL, the FL is completely emission-free and therefore offers the cleanest form of passenger transport over water. The taxi boat is equipped with two 20Kw – 96 volt water-cooled Bellmarine / Transfluid Drivemaster electric motors. Besides the environmental benefits, the water taxi is also silent and gives hardly any vibrations while sailing.

Wanna have more information on other watertaxi’s? Please check out this page
